subject: Tennis
Stadiums and Arenas
United States Open (Tennis)
organizations: Billie Jean King National Tennis Center
lead_paragraph: At the U.S. Open, where thwacks echo across eras, the grounds are in classic New York dig-we-must mode in preparation for a retractable roof in two years.
snippet: At the U.S. Open, where thwacks echo across eras, the grounds are in classic New York dig-we-must mode in preparation for a retractable roof in two years.
